name: gimp
content:
informal offensive an unpleasant or stupid person: I can't stand that gimp.
US informal offensive a person with a physical disability, especially one that affects someone's legs
US informal a limp (= a way of walking slowly and with difficulty because of having an injured or painful leg or foot )
a person who gets sexual pleasure from being hurt or treated badly
